sys_script_include.description: Customer extensible Class of IncidentUtilsSNC . Customers can override the public methods of IncidentUtilsSNC for their own business needs.
sys_script_include.name: LMSUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_75a0fbd01b569910afb9a932f54bcb4d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_g_cd3_learning.LMSUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Customer extensible Class of IncidentUtilsSNC . Customers can override the public methods of IncidentUtilsSNC for their own business needs.</description><name>LMSUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var LMSUtils = Class.create();
LMSUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(LMSUtilsSNC, {
    initialize: function() {
	LMSUtilsSNC.prototype.initialize.call(this);
    },
    /***************Custom changes****************/	
    type: 'LMSUtils'	
});

LMSUtils.isCopyIncidentEnabled = function(current) {
	var lmsUtils = new LMSUtils();
	return lmsUtils.isCopyIncidentFlagValid();
	
};

LMSUtils.isCreateChildIncidentEnabled = function(current) {
	var lmsUtils = new LMSUtils();
	return lmsUtils.isCreateChildIncidentFlagValid();
	
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Richard.Duong@dss.ca.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-29 00:25:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>75a0fbd01b569910afb9a932f54bcb4d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LMSUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Learning Management System Incident" source="x_g_cd3_learning">bcd721f11b0ed1505785a7dbe54bcb92</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Learning Management System Incident">bcd721f11b0ed1505785a7dbe54bcb92</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_75a0fbd01b569910afb9a932f54bcb4d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Richard.Duong@dss.ca.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-29 00:32:48</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
